text: I think it's very important that you focus on one thing specially to move forward in this industry. Being confused in the middle of so many options will make it harder. But it is understandable that you are having difficulty to make a decision right now as your a beginner. As you mentioned you are passionate about compositing, I will suggest look more into it. When I started I was studying 2D and 3D and then I discovered getting into compositing was a little easier than 3D/animation, so I chose composting and that is what I absolutely love doing now. So I believe if your passionate about compositing, pursue your career into it. You can always try different things later on if your not happy with that.
